name: Bohemian Fig - Whipped Argan Oil Refillable Firming Body Butter Jar
categories: Bath & Body, Body Moisturizers, Body Lotions & Body Oils
about: What it is:u00a0An air-whipped full-body moisturizer with argan oil that rapidly soaks in, delivering juicy firmness, intense hydration, and an all-over glow.Fragrance Family:u00a0Earthy & Woody.Scent Type:u00a0Warm Woods.Key Notes:u00a0Vetiver & Vanilla OrchidFragrance Description: An opulent blend of fruit and woodu2014the brightness of citrus, mingling with Venezuelan tonkau2014evokes the experience of biting into a ripe fig. About the Fragrance:u00a0As fragrance purists and planet lovers, Josie Maran uses only 100 percent plant-based essences: real fruits, nuts, woods, and plants. Because nothing beats the real thing..Highlighted Ingredients:- Argan Oil: An abundant source of essential fatty acids, antioxidants, and vitamin E..- Avocado Oil: Known to improve the look of skin elasticity and firmness, rich in antioxidants..- Shea Butter: Known to moisturize and soothe, helping skin stay supple...What Else You Need to Know: This body butter absorbs rapidly on dry skin for a velvety-soft and firming finish that lasts all day. Responsibly sourced argan is whipped to creamy perfection with 100% plant-based fragrances in a lightweight yet rich formula. With the refill system, top up your amber glass jar and reuse forever...Research Results:u00a0In a consumer perception survey of 39 people using the body butter on their thighs, stomach, and arms:.- 100% agreed their skin felt deeply hydrated and moisturized throughout the day after one use.- 97% agreed that the product provided an instant glow after one use.- 97% saw a noticeable improvement in firmness and tone after 2 weeks.Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Argan Oil:  An abundant source of essential fatty acids, antioxidants, and Vitamin E..-Avocado Oil:  Known to improve the look of skin elasticity and firmness; rich in antioxidants..-Shea Butter:  Known to moisturize and soothe, helping skin stay supple...Aqua (Water)**, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil*, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride**, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil**, Glyceryl Stearate**, Glycerin**, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter**, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyl Dimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Fragrance (Parfum)**, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice*, Camellia Sinensis (White Tea) Leaf Extract**, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract**, Symphytum Officinale (Comfrey) Leaf Extract**, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil**, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Flower Extract**, Squalane**, Beta-Carotene**, Citric Acid**, Tocopherol**, Allantoin**, Panthenol**, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate**, Polysorbate-60**, Cetearyl Glucoside, Cetearyl Alcohol**, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Eugenol, Coumarin. ..*Organic..**Naturally derived...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Massage generously into skin for an instant moisture boost..Josieu2019s tip:.-For best results, use after showering when pores are open and receptive to the whipped, velvety goodness....Recycling Instructions:.-Remove the cap of the jar, remove red liner from inside the cap, rinse both cap and jar thoroughly, and drop the separated jar and cap in your at-home recycling bin..-Liner can be recycled through TerraCycle. Flatten product box and drop in your at-home recycling bin..-Recycle pouch through TerraCycle....Refill Product Instructions:.-With the refill pouches, you can top up your gorgeous amber glass jar and reuse it forever. Each pouch refills the 6 oz. jar 2.25 times.

reviews.review_title: Not a fan of the scent, but very moisturizing.

reviews.review_text: The Josie Maran, body butter in Bohemian Fig is very moisturizing to my skin.  I wasn't a fan of the scent, it gives off a smokey and woodsy notes. Since I don't care for the scent I have been using it on my feet, it's been great!  I do love the pouch style packaging which is great for my purse or travel bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s very hydrating. The whipped argan oil in fig is a more thick moisturizer for dry skin. I like the texture because itu2019s very creamy so you donu2019t need a lot. The smell is nice, it has a mixed of fig, vanilla, and some bergamot.

Excellent smell. I love the smell of fig and loved the smell of this but I love how it comes in a reusable small pick so you can try it without wasting a whole bottle. Would recommend for sure and hope they come with more scents

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Combination skin

I definitely recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin

Great on it's own, doesn't project a lot so great for bedtime or running errands. I have been using it on workdays to layer with my fall perfumes that lean spicy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin

Itu2019s far more convenient and compact enough to put in any type of bag. 100% will be grabbing a full size of Bohemian Fig!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This body butter makes my skin super soft , smooth and firmed to the touch. It has the most luxurious whipped texture and it smells wonderful.  I love that it absorbs fast without leaving greasy or heavy residual on my skin. It works wonders on my dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited for the Josie Maran travel size lotion to put in my purse. I always get dry hands and this is the absolute best size to keep in your purse or in your car. The Vetiver and Vanilla Orchid is so strong and smells awful. It literally makes me sick smelling it. I would not purchase this scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just got Josie Maran's Mini Whipped Argan Oil Firming Body Butter in Bohemian Fig, and this new fragrance is out of this qorld good. It smells good enough to eat! And it left my thighs firmed up and looking a lot less jiggly. Great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this. My skin is dry and this helps so much. It hydrates my skin and smells so pleasant. It is not greasy at all or messy. It does absorbs to my skin pretty evenly. I love how creamy and smooth this is.  It is definitely luxurious.

reviews.review_title: Not a fan of this scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying a product by Josie Maran and while I liked the product itself and how it felt, I was not a fan of the bohemian fig fragrance. To me,  it smells like overripe fruit with a bit of musk. Luckily the scent was not too strong on my skin and my perfume covered it up. I found the travel pouch a cute idea (reminded me of my kids applesauce and yogurt pouches) but it was extremely hard to open initially. The body butter itself was very smooth, silky and light and absorbed almost immediately while putting it on. It left my skin feeling soft and supple.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product, like how thick and creamy feels, left my legs, arms and hands soft and hydrated, like the smell of it too, but I would prefer less vanilla scent on it though, at least it doesnu2019t interfere with the results itu2019s delivered. Love how friendly and lightweight is the packaging, perfect for travel. Definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE me a refill pouch - so much less waste, so easy to store & i donu2019t have to repurchase as often. This body butter is rich & has a warm scent which I like. It smells great & does a great job of buttering my body up. I will say the first time I used it I rubbed it in a little too long I guess because it pilled. BUT I stop a bit sooner now & donu2019t have that issue, just be warned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this body butter and that it now comes with refills so that I don't need to purchase the whole original size/packaging again. These are refills that can also be used on their own which is awesome. It's also very moisturizing. It's thick but not too thick to where it doesn't dry down. I use it at night after showering and by the morning, my skin is so soft and healthy looking and feeling. The fig scent isn't my favorite but I do love the vanilla one. I will continue to use it though because it's not an overwhelming scent and it dies down after applying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this body butter - the size makes it so convenient. The fragrance is very soft so not too overwhelming. As for the texture - My skin felt so soft after using this. Itu2019s not too thick and not too watery. The perfect consistency.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lotion went beyond my expectations! It is so moisturizing and the fragrance isnu2019t too strong which I like! I like the travel size, it has plenty of product too. The lotion soaks into my skin so easily and doesnu2019t leave me feeling greasy. I will definitely be recommending this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Josie Maran Mini Whipped Argan Oil Body butter in Vanilla Vibezzz in exchange for this post. I love the packaging that can carry around as hand cream or travel as body butter. Josie Maran is well known with their argan oil products. This butter is thick but quick to absorb. I can use it all season.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this body butter! It is so thick and moisturizing and makes my skin feel so smooth, unlike other runny moisturizers. I love how it smells as well. It makes my body feel nice and hydrated. I would highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This airy, lightweight moisturizing cream with argan oil instantly absorbs, leaving the skin firm, hydrated, and radiant. The fig scent is simply divine! I definitely recommend it to anyone looking for intense hydration and a pleasant feeling on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Rich and hydrating! This body butter is no joke. I love how hydrating it is but without being sticky or too thick. Iu2019ve been applying it daily to my hands during winter and my hands are no longer chopped and dry. The scent is interesting, I have the Bohemian Fig one and I personally love it, the scent isnu2019t for everyone, but if youu2019re into rich, heavy and oriental fragrance you will love this one.  Im interested to try the other scents from this line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gave this lotion a truly and i am impressed. The packaging is so perfect and convenience to travel with. Not to mention,  i really enjoy the formula and consistency of the lotion. I definitely recommend

reviews.review_title: Delightful Scent and All Day Moisture
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am extremely impressed with the scent, texture and quality of this Josie Maran Mini Whipped Argan Oil Body Butter in the delightful Bohemian Fig scent. I absolutely love the texture of this body butter because it is luxuriously whipped to perfection, making it incredibly light and airy, yet supremely moisturizing. I like how it melts effortlessly into my skin, leaving it feeling velvety-soft and hydrated without any greasy residue. The Bohemian Fig scent is an absolute delight to the senses. It's warm, inviting, and subtly sweet, with a hint of earthiness that is both comforting and refreshing. The fragrance lingers on the skin, enveloping me in a subtle aura of luxury and relaxation throughout the day. I do like the mini size of this body butter because it is perfect for on-the-go hydration. Its compact packaging makes it convenient to toss into my purse ensuring that I always have nourishing moisture at my fingertips, wherever I go. Despite its small size, a little goes a long way, making this mini body butter surprisingly long-lasting. I love that this body butter is formulated without parabens, sulfates, or phthalates gives me peace of mind, knowing that I'm nourishing my skin with only the best. What truly sets this body butter apart is its ability to deeply hydrate and nourish my skin, leaving it feeling soft, smooth, and revitalized. The infusion of argan oil provides a potent dose of hydration and essential nutrients, making it suitable for even the driest skin types. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who is looking for a body butter that provides all day moisture with a delightful scent as you will not be disappointed in this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This fig-scented body butter is a delightful sensory experience, offering a rich and luxurious fragrance that lingers throughout the day and is deeply nourishing making the skin fully covered for 24 hours without being heavy. With enough product for four full-body applications in the travel size, its concentrated formula ensures a little goes a long way. The convenient travel size and packaging make it a perfect on-the-go companion, combining indulgence with practicality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is okay on my body. It felt so small and smooth on my skin. Itu2019s travel size so I can bring it with me in my purse and use it whenever I need to use some. Would definitely buy in more scents.

This body butter was amazing the texture was very smooth and it soaked into my skin very well and I have combination skin and it work well for my skin the smell was okay I was not really a fan but overall will by again just a different scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy using this whipped body butter. The fig fragrance is not too overpowering and when it dries down, it smells divine. It doesnu2019t feel too thick or greasy either and I like using it on damp skin.

Such a great body butter ! Itu2019s rich and such a supple consistency. I have very dry skin and this has helped so much ! I love using this when Iu2019m showing more skin because it leaves a beautiful radiance look !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time trying anything from Josie Maran and I was not disappointed! Such a rich and nourishing cream, but sinks in beautifully. I really appreciate that the scent is all natural; itu2019s very faint and honestly kind of neutral and thatu2019s my preference. I LOVE that itu2019s refillable, and the jar is nice and heavy. This is so nice and definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: The Josie Maran Mini Whipped Argan Oil Body Butter in Bohemian Fig is a great moisturizer for my skin. The product is absorbed by my skin quickly and is quite rich. I love the concept of being able to refill the jar with the refillable pouches to reduce waste!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Josie Maran is the best moisturizer Iu2019ve ever used. It has transformed my skin. The moment I opened the jar I was blown away by this beautiful sweet aroma. Other lotions, even some of the best, only work temporarily, but I see long term permanent skin improvement with Josie Maran.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This whipped body butter is infused with hydrating argan oil and has a rich, thick texture that feels luxurious when applied. Boasting an earthy scent, the Bohemian Fig fragrance is definitely unique and while I like the scent, I wish it was a bit less woody and a bit more warm and sweet. The body butter itself has a lusciously, creamy consistency and melts into the skin like a dream. It also contains shea butter and avocado oil in addition to the argan oil, so it not only moisturizes, but also provides antioxidant benefits, which also aids in helping firm the skin, improving elasticity and keeping skin soft and supple. You can also order refills for the jar, which I think is a fantastic option. I absolutely love the way my skin feels using this body butter, however I would likely choose a different scent next time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the whipped texture that easy blends into the skin leaving it very hydrated. The comforting & warm scent makes it the perfect body butter on a cool day. I say this is the perfect travel size to bring anywhere! Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely moisturizing and feels great on the skin - however I wish the scent was more true to vanilla & fig and less on the vetiver side. It smells very earthy so not particularly what I was expecting, but could still be ideal for someone that enjoys vetiver scents! Absorbed into the skin beautifully and I love the concept of the packaging (I got the refill/travel size one), doesnu2019t take up any room in my carryon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This lotion is luxurious and creamy. It melts into my skin and nourishes my skin. This smells amazing like a soft summer breeze with vanilla blossom and fig. This body butter is very hydrating and I love it. I would definitely recommend this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! If you had dry skin before using this, then you can kiss it goodbye the moment this body butter hits your skin. It is ultra rich and creamy, and I love the whipped feeling. The hydration this provides is the next level from the argan oil. It also smells amazing. Seriously, buy some for yourself, your mom, your sister, your child's teacher, anyone with skin, you won't regret it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The bohemian fig body butter has a whipped texture and is super hydrating. It absorbs well and is non-greasy. The scent is super comforting, warm, and is perfect on a cool day. I love the glass jar and that you can buy refill pouches to reduce waste.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this from Josie Maran ! I absolutely love the scent of this thought i wish it had more of a vanilla scent. It is rich and creamy and makes my skin feel hydrated all day long. I will definitely be purchasing more

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This lotion smells so good! Since itu2019s whipped, itu2019s light and airy and absorbs easily into your skin without leaving a greasy film. I like that it contains argan oil and that you can buy refills for the container.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Josie Maran Whipped Argan Oil Body Butter in Bohemian Fig is the best body cream I have ever used.  This luscious buttery formula is a ground breaker and amazing in its capacity to melt into the skin where you need it most.  It smells amazing and I absolutely love it because the argan oil prevents dry skin and allows for smooth looking hydrated skin.  My body is loving it and I highly recommend.   You will not be disappointed.

reviews.review_text: First of all I love the new packaging, itu2019s really pretty. The texture feels nice and easy to work with however it doesnu2019t fully absorb into the skin and stays greasy feeling for a long time. The scent is nice though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this body butter from Josie Maran and I think the fig scent is my favorite! It reminds me of summer ! I really love the mini sizes , they will be perfect for my upcoming trip to Florida! If you have dry skin and want a moisturizer with no frills , this is it! Totally worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is super moisturizing. I apply it all over my body. It leaves my skin very hydrated and with a perfect glow. I like to apply it to my feet and hands. it has a very pleasant smell. The texture is so nice to feel on the skin. I really like how my skin feels after including this moisturizer in my body care routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Describe the product in your own words and what you like about it This whipped-textured body butter is thinner than I expected, but I really like it. I'm used to super thick creams, but this texture is refreshing, especially going into spring and summer. The scent is delicate and smells of fig and vanilla - very sophisticated. The packaging is super cute and I love that it can be refilled, yay for that! It soaks in quickly and it makes my skin moisturized and glowy! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is incredibly fresh and vibrant, the fig brings a very springy vibe to the product! It sinks in quickly and I like layering this scent with a warm sunny fragrance for all day lasting power. It's very thick and hydrating!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lotion had a nice whipped texture and a little went a long way with it. The smell was nice and not overpowering and didnu2019t affect my mom who has allergies when she smelt it. I tried it on one leg just to see and even the next day it was noticeably softer compared to my other leg the next day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: First of all this product is insane. So incredibly hydrating and smoothing without leaving your skin sticky or greasy. The scent is great. However, itu2019s a little overpowering for me. If you like stronger scent this is the product for you. I prefer the vanilla scent of this product, however, it works wonders.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this firming body butter!!! It smells so nice just like fig and leaves my skin feeling so soft and smooth! I love the quality and texture of this body butter and it is perfect for traveling!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lotion is smells unreal. Goes on super thick and hydrates just like all the other lotions Iu2019ve used from Josie maran. This one is even cooler in this flexy style packaging to bring on the go!

reviews.review_title: I need one of each scent!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this travel sized body butter! The smell and texture is so warm and luxurious, it makes me feel so good! I donu2019t quite smell a fig scent but to me it smells like a really classy almond vanilla scent. Iu2019m surprised how long Iu2019m able to use this because I only need a quarter sized amount for both my legs and another quartered size dollop for my arms. The packaging is great for taking on the go because it fits in small spaces. Love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the texture of this body butter, itu2019s not too thick and not greasy. It absorbs nicely into my skin and I love how smooth and hydrated it leaves it. The scent is wonderful too! This definitely pairs beautifully with the Bohemian Fig body scrub. Not just because of the scent but it makes a great duo for very smooth, moisturized, glowy skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This body butter is so luscious! I love the unique scent of this one as well. The packaging is definitely a stand out for me, this sealable flat pack makes it great for traveling and on the go. Definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off I wanted to say is this product was complementary from Josie maran. The smell of this product is absolutely amazing It has a light fragrance. I also like the packaging. It's easy to use. It's nice cuz you can put it in your purse and it doesn't take up a lot of room. I also like the fact that it doesn't irritate my skin because my skin can get rather picky on certain products. It's soaks in pretty quickly into the skin. Non-greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging on this is so smart. Super travel friendly and you can easily throw it in your purse. Iu2019m really into checking ingredients and Iu2019m impressed that the argan oil is the second ingredient. Super moisturizing, sinks in fast and the bohemian fig smells earthy, sexy and so warm. Will definitely get the big size next time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This body butter works wonders on my dry skin during the winter. It absorbs quickly into my skin and also the packaging is top notch. I love the fruity fig scent and itu2019s not too overpowering which I prefer. My skin feels moisturized all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I use this body butter about two weeks and absolutely enjoy it. The texture is lightweight, whipped and well absorbing yet the formula is so moisturizing and nourishing. My skin feels soft and supple. The scent is very delicate , on green side ( more like fig leaves) and refreshing. I think it would be a great body product for summer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ugh the texture of this body butter is amazing and I appreciate the high quality ingredients like the oils and shea butter but the scent is not fig at all. It doesn't even have a fig note but it's called fig so that's a bit misleading. The tangerine scent is better for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells delicious like a real fig. The texture is so soft and creamy that easily sinks into the skin. The smell lingers on the skin all day. Itu2019s hard to find a good fig scent and this one is wonderful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After a couple of days using the Josie Maran product. I can honestly say itu2019s a really good cru00e8me. It keeps my hands and body from being ashy and dry which happens during the winter. It was smooth and the smell is amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This whipped body butter is AMAZING, it has a very favorable/drawing smell that I canu2019t get enough of! Itu2019s a thick body butter that gives my skin instant hydration with out the greasy residue. This leaves my skin so soft with a radiating glow, perfect for dry skin! The container itself amazes me itu2019s a gorgeous heavy glass packaging and the best part is that itu2019s refillable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This body butter is pretty good, not super thick, more like a lotion consistency, but deep hydration that lasts for a long time. The light scent is nice as well. The feel on my skin is great and the skin hydration is long lasting

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this super cute and unique packaging! This is also travel sized which is awesome. This has a great thick consistency to it without leaving a weird film in the skin and smells amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, but the chemist behind this product needs a raise! As a dark skin girly Iu2019m always looking for something that will give my skin a nice glow and this didnu2019t disappoint. I love that itu2019s travel sized and I can easily take it with me. Will 100% be buying the bigger sizes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Renewed! That's how my skin feels after using this. Dry indoor air this winter really took a toll on my skin, but now it's beginning to look repaired and rejuvenated. Lovely scent and absorbs quickly.

reviews.review_title: My dry skin drinks it right up.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been enjoying this whipped body butter. I like the convenience of the pouch. Perfect size to try before deciding on whether or not I wanted to not the full-size. Itu2019s perfect to keep in my gym bag or when traveling. The texture is quite thick and you donu2019t need a lot of product. A little goes a long ways. It absorbed quickly in my dry skin, but itu2019s not greasy and gives the skin a nice glow. Iu2019m looking forward to see how it looks when my skin is more tanned this Summer. I do like the fig scent, but for me itu2019s not a fruity scent more of a woody fragrance. .I do appreciate that this brand has refillable options on some of their packaging as well. I plan on purchasing the travel size vanilla bean next.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Josie Maran body butters are the best out there. I love the ultra smooth texture of this butter and the way it makes me skin feel. My skin looks healthy with a glow and doesnu2019t feel greasy at all after application. The recyclable packaging is awesome too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Canu2019t wait to take this amazing product with me during my upcoming trip! Love how convenient the size of this for travel! The packaging is perfect, it does not take a lot of space. The fragrance is amazing and it leaves my skin feeling so soft, giving it the perfect glow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The very first thing I noticed about this lotion is how glowy it makes my skin look! The texture is a nice, fine consistency and a little goes a long way. It absorbs into my skin quickly and leaves it feeling smooth and hydrated without feeling greasy. I love the packaging too. Itu2019s so easy to just toss in your purse and bring it along with you! Iu2019m not crazy about this scent, but I highly recommend the vanilla scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so obsessed with the formula of their body butter. This leaves my skin feeling super soft and nourished plus I really do not need a lot as a little bit goes a long way. The scent of this is very subtle yet so pretty. It has a slight tropical scent to it and is a bit flowery. It smells beautiful without being overwhelming. My skin also does not feel greasy or dry after use. This has been helping my dry skin to survive the winter and it just blends in like a dream while leaving my skin feeling So soft over time. I definitely see a difference for my sensitive dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This comes in a refillable glass tub, very sturdy. The body butter itself has a soft, whipped texture. It feels nice and smooth when applied. It gives skin a nice glow before getting fully absorbed. Itu2019s not sticky nor greasy, and leaves skin hydrated and moisturized. The scent is pleasant and subtle. It doesnu2019t last the whole day but Iu2019m happy that itu2019s not as strong as competitors. It complements my unisex perfumes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I thought the pouch was a little silly at first (like, am I going to mistake this for applesauce?) but Iu2019ve actually grown to like it. I like that itu2019s flexible, which makes it super easy to pack (ideal for a travel size). The lotion is more creamy and rich than whipped in texture, so it feels luxurious going on. The fig scent is earthy and only slightly sweetu2014very sophisticated!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This body cream is SUPER thick but in a good way! It gives my skin instant hydration especially in the dry areas like my elbow and back of my thighs but it doesnu2019t feel greasy or heavy. My skin feels smooth and looks healthy and the smell is so delicious!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for this post. The best body butter, makes my skin so soft and gives a beautiful glow! Also it doesnu2019t feel heavy, itu2019s super lightweight but moisturizing. The scent isnu2019t my favorite, I would love to try a different scent but I highly recommend this body butter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: the SMELLLL OF THIS PRODUCT! you need it for that alone. as if that wasnu2019t amazing enough, itu2019s also super moisturizing and rich- i love it! a must after an everything showeru202610/10 recommend! (if you donu2019t like eating figs like me, still give this a shot)

reviews.review_title: Hydrating and doesnu2019t leave you greasy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The travel pouches are such a great idea, easy to travel with and does not leak. Iu2019m using fig. The scent is subtle and not overwhelming. It is more unisex, not fruity. The vetiver is more pronounced than the fig. Leaves your skin hydrated and soft. Itu2019s very moisturizing and not a lot is needed if you use the right amount, it isnu2019t greasy. Really loving the packaging revamp, so much more modern with the same formula you love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm absolutely in love  with the Bohemian Fig Whipped Argan Oil Refillable Firming Body Butter! The fragrance is wonderfully subtle yet delightful, and the texture is incredibly soft and smooth. It effortlessly absorbs into my skin without any greasiness or stickiness, drying down quickly. My skin feels intensely hydrated and irresistibly soft after each use, and I can't get enough of the convenient refillable packaging. It's a must-have for anyone looking for a luxurious and effective body butter experience!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So far this is the second product I have tried from this line & to be honest I am personally not the biggest fan of the scent. Perhaps this is because I don't typically lean towards fruity scents. The texture of the product is water-like but still very hydrating! My skin is left smooth and glowy which is what you hope to get from a body butter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the new JM upgrade! This body butter is one of my fave body creams! It is very hydrating and creamy! I love how rich it is and how well it blends into the skin without having to rub it in for a long time. It also leaves such a nice glow in the skin. The scent is nice. It is a fig scent with hints of vanilla. The only downside for me is the price for something I would use constantly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This body butter comes in a recyclable pack. The whipped body butter is in a big glass jar that has a seal attached to the top of the cap. The body butter itself is adequately thick enough to spread and blends easily on my skin. It leaves my skin feeling silky smooth. I love that it has a refill program. Iu2019ve never heard of any company actively trying to reuse their packaging for the good of the environment. I got the one with bohemian fig and vanilla scent.
